arts.ttl: Real Mallorca back in La Liga action on Saturday
arts.sum: – Real Mallorca return to league action tomorrow, Saturday 14th, against unbeaten Villareal in the Son Moix, kick off 2pm. Mallorca face two high level weeks of games and it must be a nightmare for La Liga coaches to pick starting XIs when players have fewer and fewer days of rest.

It’s never a good idea to lose a game with two minutes left on the clock, but Mallorca, with one less player against a team of the quality of Villarreal, were facing an almost impossible task. A huge mistake from the normally reliable workhorse Samu Costa in the dying seconds of added-on time saw 10-man Mallorca lose to Villarreal on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Preview: Mallorca vs. Villarreal - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's La Liga clash between Mallorca and Villarreal, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
Liam Flin has taken a look at the fixture list for matchday five of the LaLiga season and has picked out a score prediction for each match.
